verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%> in <S%G1056>Galilee:<s%> for he <S%G2309>would<s%> not <S%G4043>walk<s%> in <S%G2449>Jewry,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> him.

For <S%G3761>neither<s%> did his <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> in him.

The <S%G2889>world<s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3404>hate<s%> you; but me it <S%G3404>hates,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G3140>testify<s%> of it, that the <S%G2041>works<s%> thereof <S%G3012><s%> <S%G846><s%> are evil. <S%G4190><s%>

When he had <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> words to them, he <S%G3306>stayed<s%> still in <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> him <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G1859>feast,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4226>Where<s%> is he?

<S%G3475>Moses<s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to you <S%G4061>circumcision;<s%> (not <S%G3754>because<s%> it is of <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> but of the fathers; <S%G3962><s%> ) and you <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day <S%G4059>circumcise<s%> a man. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of them of <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> Is not <S%G3778>this<s%> he, <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G615>kill?<s%>

<S%G235>However,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> man from <S%G4159>where<s%> he is: but <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> from <S%G4159>where<s%> he is.

<S%G5101>What<s%> manner of <S%G3056>saying<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> that he <S%G2036>said,<s%> You shall seek me, and shall not <S%G2147>find<s%> me: and <S%G3699>where<s%> I <S%G1510>am,<s%> thither you <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G2064>come?<s%>
